oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic bread-wheat in New England, USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rasmussen, Ilse A.
Mallory, Ellen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In October 2010, researchers, farmers and millers from Maine and Vermont, USA, organized a trip to Denmark, in order to learn about local bread wheat production, milling and use from their more experienced counterparts with climates similar to their own. They have received a grant over four years for the project antitled Enhancing Farmersâ€™ Capacity to Produce High Quality Organic Bread Wheat in which they will carry out research, development and education to improve the production and quality of organic bread wheat in the two states.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rasmussen, Ilse A. and Mallory, Ellen (2010) Organic bread-wheat in New England, USA. ICROFS news, November 2010 (4), pp. 12-13.
